Title: Prohibits the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons or machinery from the United States government
Summary: Prohibits the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons or machinery from the United States government.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, Exec L; amd ยง656, County L; amd ยง150, Town L; add ยง4-a, Chap 360 of 1911
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the county law, the town law and chapter 360 of the laws of 1911 relating to police in certain municipalities, in relation to prohibit the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons or machinery from the United States government
